Unicache
CSL ARCH Module » M4

Files

file  unicache.h
 This file contains the interfaces present in the Uni-cache HAL. This also contains some related macros, structures and enums.
 

Macros

#define UNICACHE_WAIT_INFINITE   (0xFFFFFFFFU)
 UNICACHE_WAIT_INFINITE: Macro defining the flag for infinite wait.
 
#define UNICACHE_WAIT_NOWAIT   (0x0U)
 UNICACHE_WAIT_NOWAIT: Macro defining the flag for no wait.
 
#define UNICACHE_LINE_SIZE   ((uint32_t) 32U)
 This macro defines the size of the uni-cache line in bytes.
 
#define UNICACHE_LINE_ADDRESS_MASK   (~((uint32_t) 0x1FU))
 This macro defines the mask value used to calculate uni-cache line address.

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define UNICACHE_MAX_LINE_MODE_BUFF_SIZE   ((uint32_t) 1024U)

This macro defines the maximum buffer size for doing discrete cache line operations in bytes.

For buffers below a certain size, cache maintenance operations are more efficient if performed on single cache lines at a time rather than on an entire region. For buffer sizes equal to or less than this value, the invalidate and write back APIs use a series of individual cache line operations. For buffer sizes large than this value, a a single block mode operation will be performed.

Function Documentation

void UNICACHEDisable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function disables the unicache.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
Returns
None.
void UNICACHEEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr)

This function first checks if unicache is enabled and enables it if it is not enabled.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
Returns
None.
Note
The check is needed because hard fault is created on IPU if unicache is enabled when the enable bit was set previously only.
int32_t UNICACHEInvalidate ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  startAddress,
uint32_t  byteCount,
uint32_t  tWait 
)

This function invalidates the cache lines in the region defined by maintenance start/end address.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
startAddressMaintenance region start address.
byteCountLength of the maintenance region.
tWaitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
int32_t UNICACHEInvalidateAll ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  tWait 
)

This function invalidates the whole unicache.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
tWaitWait Time for maintenance operation completion.
Returns
status Whether maintenance operation completed successfully. STW_SOK : Success STW_EFAIL : Failure
void UNICACHEInvalidateCacheLine ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  maintenanceAddr 
)

This function invalidates one cache line.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of Uni-cache registers.
maintenanceAddrMaintenance Address. Should be aligned as per cache line size UNICACHE_LINE_SIZE.
Returns
None.
Note
This API does not wait for maintenance operation to complete. App should take care of timing considerations.

uint32_t  startAddress,
uint32_t  byteCount,
uint32_t  tWait

uint32_t  maintenanceAddr 
)
